# Changelog

## Version 1.2.1

- added comodojo/exceptions as a dependency

## Version 1.2.0

### Added

- Support for gzip-encoded data;
- More auth methods

### Fixed
- Many errors fixed;

### Other
- Unit test with phpunit
- MIT license instead of GPL

## Version 1.1.0

### Added
- setHost and setCurl methods
- support for multiple requests

### Other
- code cleanup

## Version 1.0.0

- Initial release
